entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 8:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
